snippet: Bob Menendez, a powerful Senate Democrat, indicated that he might allow the transfer of AH-64 Apache helicopters to Iraq as Baghdad struggles to recapture key territory from Islamic extremists.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: Bob Menendez, a powerful Senate Democrat, indicated that he might allow the transfer of AH-64 Apache helicopters to Iraq as Baghdad struggles to recapture key territory from Islamic extremists.

headline.main: Senator Signals Support for Sending Helicopters to Iraq
